section_a.beneficiaries: secondary school age students and youths who wish to engage with paid part-time employment. These people will benefit by: Receiving support, mentoring and coaching to prepare them for part time paid employment Support youths in the application of suitable roles Helping them understand their strengths and how they can be applied in the workplace Engaging in meaningful and projects that will benefit an employer Helping them understand business strategy, operations, sales, marketing, IT, finance, recruitment, fundraising and the creative process Receiving a wage in return for their contribution Learning Entrepreneurial skills Learn employability, time management, financial literacy, technology and life skills Learning about and creating savings
